std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johannes van den Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 225, entry number 1813. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 166
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Father with van den berg anywhere in the surname with pieter meintjies anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johannes van den Berg baptism on 14 May 1805, son of Pieter Meintjies van den Berg & Nn Nn.

std_narrative.citation:
Johannes, son of Pieter Meintjies van den Berg & Nn Nn, was baptised on 14 May 1805. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johannes van den Berg"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 225, entry number 1813. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 166
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Father with van den berg anywhere in the surname with pieter meintjies anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johannes van den Berg baptism on 14 May 1805, son of Pieter Meintjies van den Berg & Nn Nn.
